programme.title: M1 - Day 1 - ATP 250 IEB+ Argentina Open - Buenos Aires 2026
programme.desc: Outdoor clay-court action returns to Buenos Aires from 9–15 February 2026, staged at the Buenos Aires Lawn Tennis Club as part of the ATP Tour. The tournament features a 28-player singles main draw and a 16-team doubles draw, with total prize money of US$675,310 and 250 ranking points awarded to the singles champion.

programme.title: HH The Amir Trophy and Sword - Day 3 - The Amir Sword Festival 2024
HH The Amir Trophy and Sword - Day 3 - The Amir Sword Festival 2024
Equestrian - HH The Amir Sword 2025
programme.desc: Experience the thrill and grandeur of H.H. The Amir Sword Festival, the crown jewel of Qatar's racing calendar, from February 13–15, 2025. Hosted by the Qatar Racing and Equestrian Club at Al Rayyan Racecourse, this unmissable event shines a global spotlight on Qatar's rich equestrian heritage and world-class horseracing. Witness the excitement of the season’s two most celebrated races: H.H. The Amir Sword and the H.H. The Amir Trophy presented by Longines. These breathtaking showdowns bring together elite Pure Arabian and Thoroughbred horses from across the globe, competing for a share of the staggering $10 million prize purse and their place in racing history.

programme.title: M1 - Day 2 - ATP 250 IEB+ Argentina Open - Buenos Aires 2026
programme.desc: Outdoor clay-court action returns to Buenos Aires from 9–15 February 2026, staged at the Buenos Aires Lawn Tennis Club as part of the ATP Tour. The tournament features a 28-player singles main draw and a 16-team doubles draw, with total prize money of US$675,310 and 250 ranking points awarded to the singles champion.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Their last defeat was in December 1999, losing 2-0 thanks to a Stephen McPhail brace. Following their 3-1 win at Elland Road in December, Leeds are looking to complete the league double over Chelsea for the first time since their 1991-92 title winning campaign.

programme.title: EN Spirit of Sport Series 11 | E3
programme.desc: This month on Spirit of Sport, Real Madrid and England footballer Jude Bellingham takes us back to the start of his journey in Birmingham and opens up about his mental health. Ahead of the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina, freestyle skier Eileen Gu reflects on her journey to gold. Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar and tennis icon Novak Djokovic spotlight the transformative power of sport and how they’re using their platforms to give back. England Lioness Georgia Stanway visits a special football project in London to inspire the next generation.

England Lioness Georgia Stanway visits a special football project in London to inspire the next generation.

programme.desc: One of the longest-running indoor tournaments on the ATP Tour, the ABN AMRO Open is contested on fast indoor hard courts at Rotterdam Ahoy. The 32-player singles field competes for 500 ATP points and a total prize fund of €2,401,550, rewarding aggressive, first-strike tennis.

programme.title: Day 1 - M1 - ATP 500 Dallas Open - Dallas 2026

programme.desc: The tournament’s flagship center court (14,820 seats) with a retractable roof, staging the biggest day sessions (from 11:00am local) and night sessions (from 7:00pm local). programme.title: Chelsea vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last seven Premier League home games against Leeds, winning the last six in a row. Their last defeat was in December 1999, losing 2-0 thanks to a Stephen McPhail brace. Following their 3-1 win at Elland Road in December, Leeds are looking to complete the league double over Chelsea for the first time since their 1991-92 title winning campaign.

Qatar SC vs Al Rayyan - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W15
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Match For Hope - Qatar 2026
programme.desc: Chunkz won the first edition in 2024. Aboflah took his revenge in 2025. Now, in 2026, the two creator captains face each other for the third and final showdown, live from Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, Doha. All the funds go to support quality education for disadvantaged young people across the Middle East, Asia and Africa Match for Hope has raised over $19.5 million, giving thousands of children hope for a brighter future

programme.title: Tremblay vs Paris - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Qatar SC vs Al Rayyan - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W15
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.
